tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy,Cervical Cerclage,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I would highly recommend Dr Manju Deepthi B. *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** * **** **** **** ******* I would like to share my wonderful experience with Dr Manju Deepthi who has been a God in Disguise for me. I had been looking for gynecologist for 1 year and with God's grace, I came across her and I have been consulting her since day 1 of my pregnancy.
I had a very rough pregnancy journey, and I was going to lose my baby when I was 19 weeks pregnant. On 16/11/2023 I was taken to the hospital on emergency, I was 4 cm dilated and was almost going to miscarry. Dr Manju Deepthi took a huge risk of performing emergency cerclage where my cervix was stitched. However, post preforming the initial surgery my stiches had started giving up from one side, however she refused to give up as the membrane was still intact and she performed another surgery and restitched my cervix. I was hospitalized for 3 months and was on complete bed rest and on heavy medications. I was in such a critical state where my stitches could have given up at any point and as I was on complete bed rest my baby was not gaining weight and I used to breakdown every single time when the scanning was done, but Dr Manju Deepthi always consoled me, motivated me and sympathized my situation and did her best to save me and my baby. The entire Cloudine Hospital (HRBR) stayed by my side prayed for me and constantly motivated me.
As the pregnancy continued, due to baby weight, there was a risk that my cervix could tear and could have caused a huge damage hence I had to opt for the delivery. Dr Manju Deepthi tried her best so that I could deliver the baby normally however I was in a very weak condition due to which C-section was performed and I have successfully delivered my baby on 14th February 2024 (33 weeks 4 days) and baby was 1.9 kg. Dr Manju Deepthi also had made sure that the best pediatrician and NICU Team were available at the time of my delivery and I Thank the Pediatricians Dr Sujith, Dr Sandeep and Dr Prashanth for helping my baby survive.
I don't have enough of words to describe how much grateful I am towards Dr Manju Deepthi and her Team, Hema Madam, Dr Supritha Rangaswamy, Dr Ayesha, Dr Nikitha, Dr Sahithi and all the nursing Team (Sister Balema, Deeksha, Sita, Monalisa, Anu, Sheeba and team) because of whom today my baby is doing wonderful. Thank you for all your support and prayers. And huge thank you to the Housekeeping Staff and Canteen Staff who has shown nothing but kindness towards me from day 1 and even post delivering the baby.

I strongly recommend Dr Manju Deepthi to all the women who are looking for not only a best gynecologist but an expert who will not only consult but will walk throughout your pregnancy journey by your side. She is a great listener and very calm person who would give you only honest opinion on the given situation and guide you accordingly and this is the main reason for me to continue consulting her till date.

Thank You Cloudnine Hospital (HRBR) for having such a wonderful doctor onboard.

Thank You Dr Manju Deepthi. Will always be grateful to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Choosing Dr Manju Deepthi turned out to be one of the best decisions that helped us and our baby during pregnancy
We started consulting Dr Manju Deepthi in my 2nd trimester; she is very patient, positive, knowledgeable and most importantly proactive. 
Right from Day 1, she suggested key changes (supplements and medication) that helped avoid many issues that my previous doc was not concerned about. 
She was instrumental in helping us take very informed decisions at every stage of pregnancy and birth. 
Overall, we are extremely satisfied and  recommend Dr Manju Deepthi to anyone looking for an experienced and welcoming Doctor at Cloudnine HRBR.
We are very grateful for all her support! Thank you Doctor and wish you all the very best and continued success!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Manju Deepthi is incredible. She explains the condition and her treatment in detail. She does not recommend any unnecessary tests/procedures/medication. I have been suffering from PCOS since 7 years and no one had ever taken such good care of me like her, instead everyone has given me plethora of tests with no significance, but she has always been extremely kind and considerate. She has been helpful during every step and has guided me efficiently. I had complete absence of cycle and only because of her finally I am able to experience regular cycles after 7 years. This has created such a profound effect in my life and made it so peaceful. 

I am forever indebted to her for her compassion, care and such incredible treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy Check Up,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Tests,
review:
Affordable treatment , expert in field ,and always encourages her patients to undergo normal delivery. 
 
üôèWords are not enough to express our gratitude to Dr Manju Deepti ma'am. Ma'am is a blessing in disguise for usüòá.. After miscarriage in first year of marriage we struggled to conceive again .We had consulted with few other gynes in town but none of it was fruitful we had lost our hope . Never did any of the Dr we consulted explained things to us they just merely treated us with loads of medicines and scans .They didn't understand our plight. It's was a mental and emotional toll for us.When we met Manju ma'am our lives changedüåà. The very first interaction with ma'am was positive , she filled us with ray of hope and the confidence ma'am assured us and helped us to be positive throughout our journey of pregnancy . Ma'am understood our case and acted immediately , never did ma'am treat us just as patient, we were treated like a family. After consulting ma'am her words and personal touch became our strength I was confident and the mental toll we had was eased..Even though mine was high risk pregnancy ma'am never passed any tension to us. . Ma'am was always available to answer our smallest and silliest of our queries in wee hours .. Ma'am always encouraged me to have a normal delivery  even with high risk pregnancy. It's because of ma'am we are blessed with parenthood . A special thanks to Dr Durga shekar ma'am ‚ù£Ô∏èfor always filling us with courage and supporting us throughout our journey of pregnancy.
The staff at Madilu are so welcoming and dawn a warm smile on their face which immediately comforts any one entering the place .

I would üíØ% recommend Dr MANJU DEEPTI ma'am ( MADILU HOSPITAL ) . Best gynecologist in town who know what is apt for her patients and strives immediately to give the ‚ö°best results at affordable price.‚ö°

Happy to have found you Dr Manju ma'am ‚ù£Ô∏è. God bless you and the entire team of Madilu (Dr.Durga ma'am , Sr Soji, Navya , Grace aunty, Sr Shylaja) keep up the Good work . God bless your hands and all the work you take up in future .‚ù£Ô∏è

context: PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,Pregnancy Tests,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: I very much happy to give review about dr. Manju deepthi mam. God has send her to me wen I am in trouble. We were searching doctors for my gynec problem.during dat time v dnt knw whom to meet for dis problem. V went to East point hospital to see gynecologist for my period issue. There god had shown dr. Manju deepthi mam. I met her and she took all my history and she advised me to do scan. Wen I did scan v found dat I have pcos and dat was the reason for my irregular periods and I was not getting pregnant. She started treatment for me with tablet. And later she gave injection for getting pregnant and for the embryo growth. Finally on 31st ofNovember 2021 my upt became positive. During my antinatal period she taken care of me very well. Actually no words to tell about mam. She is a god for us. Because of her and God grace I became a mother today. God has given a angel for us. Finally I delivered a baby girl on 25th of July 2022.mam has supported me mentally and financially during my maternity. I would like to highly recommend Dr. Manju deepthi mam for all gynec and obstrectic problem. 100% good result and positive environment v vl get. She is very friendly and v vl feel family kind atmosphere. I knw this review is not enough to tell about mam. Really thank u so much mam for your support ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏è God bless you mamüíûüíû

review:
***** ***** ***** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ***** She‚Äôs so polite and care taking doctor. She is not like other doctors who are dependent on the current technology she always gave us positive opinion instead of scaring us.
Thank you all for your support because of your care my twin babies and mother is fine now. We will never forget your support. She took care of my wife so well during her pregnancy journey which helped my wife to stay positive and deliver twin baby boys at 35 weeks. She explains each and everything in detail and does not hurry up treating patients. She gives enough time to each and every patient and clears all doubts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Manju Deepthi madam is a very friendly and down to earth person who takes care of her patients very well. She treats her patients just like her own siblings or relatives and is available whenever needed. We are so much satisfied with her treatment.  Mine was a twin pregnancy and it was due to her treatment I was able to deliver a healthy babies at 35 weeks without getting the babies admitted to NICU. She took care of me from the starting of my pregnancy journey till the end. She clearly explained about each and every medicine in detail and the reason for taking it and the benefits of taking it. I always recommend Manju Deepthi madam for all kind of gyanic problems and pregnancy cares. Me and my husband are very thankful for her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Me and my wife Roopa were looking out for a Gynaecologist near by to our place and a Neighbor of us recommended Manju ma'am.  This turned out to be one of the best recommendation and since then we have been consulting the ma'am right before conception till the delivery.Ma'am understands the problem of the patient and calms down and explains what needs to be done and what needs to be avoided.  We thoroughly enjoyed the Pregnancy phase of my wife and also the delivery in the hands of the ma'am. I would suggest if anyone needs any help related to Pregnancy,  Manju ma'am is one of the best doctors out there and very welcoming üôÇ

review:
I started my check up with Dr. Manju deepti from my 3rd trimester onwards and I'm totally satisfied with Dr friendliness and detailed explanation about my pregnancy through out last 3 months, she infact guide and support and encourage for Normal delivery which is utmost required, she was so friendly even during my labour pain in mid night she rush to hospital and i delivered a healthy baby.. thank you very much Dr

Must recommended for all the ladies who are pregnant out their.. please visit doctor either in her clinic Madilu or in hospital Ovum

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I and my family want to thank dr manjudeepthi from the bottom of my heart for giving me the blessing of becoming a mother. I had two failed ivf when i met madam she also told try one more round ivf . But we insisted to see our case history. After studying my menstrual cycle properly she said she will try one month. After one month study she gave me treatment for 1 month and i concieved. Now i delivered a healthy baby girl normally. The delivery was of so ease did not get to know the pain at all by her physiotherapy team. She stayed with us whole night and day. 
I have met so many busy doctors who give only 2 or 3 mins and they will simply write treatment and give medicimes and we have to follow but madam explains everything and she will allow us to take decision under her guidance. Whoever has visited madam will agree with me. My consultation with her lasted for 20 to 30 mins with throughout the clock availability. 
I wish mam all the success and good health to treat needy patients like me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,

Dr. Manju Deepthi ma'am is so friendly and she takes care of patients like family. 
She make us comfortable and clears all our doubts with a smile. Ma'am explains each and everything in detail no matter how many times you approach her. Last but not the least even the supporting staffs are good. 
I would recommend you all to visit the hospital.

review:
The place is short to write about dr manju deepthi
I met dr 4 years ago after my ivf treatment where my doctor told only caesarean for ivf pregnancy dr manju delivered me normally. All were surprised as the baby was 3.6 kg
Later I was in touch with her due to my pcod issue and wanted another baby and could not afford another ivf. Her motivation and treatment helped me conceive naturally and delivered second baby also normally. My family is complete now. Thank u doctor . May God give u more strength and good health to help more and more people like me.
